RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH:
Rene Nardi щ um experiente gestor do setor aeroespacial. Ele estс atualmente liderando uma equipe que explora oportunidades para revitalizar e expandir o mercado de Aviacao Geral, com a introduчуo de soluчѕes tecnologicas avanчadas.
Antes seu papel atual, Rene trabalhou para vсrias empresas multinacionais, incluindo um provedor de sistemas (Parker Aerospace), um fornecedor de componentes (Meggitt Aerospace), um fabricante de aeronaves (Embraer) e um operador de aeronaves executivas (Lэder Aviaчуo). A sua experiъncia profissional engloba a implementaчуo e a gestуo de projetos aeroespaciais de alto valor em ambientes multiculturais nos Estados Unidos, Amщrica Latina, Europa e Oriente Mщdio.
Rene tem mais de 35 anos de experiъncia na indњstria aeroespacial com atribuiчѕes em engenharia de sistemas, estruturas metсlicas e compѓsitos, manutenчуo de motores e estruturas, implementaчуo de processo de melhoria contэnua, implantaчуo de funчуo de qualidade e gerenciamento de programas.
Rene obteve um Ph.D. em propulsуo aeroespacial e o mestrado em pesquisa de operaчѕes no ITA - Instituto tecnologico de Aeronautica, o MBA da Hult International, e graduou em engenharia mecanica-aeroanutica pela UFMG-Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais.
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN:
Rene Nardi is a innovation strategist seasoned aerospace industry manager, with unique perspectives on the mobility industry?s greatest challenges He is currently leading a team aimed at revitalizing and expanding the General Aviation market with the introduction of technologically advanced solutions.
Before his current role, Rene worked for various multinational companies, including a system provider (Parker Aerospace), a components supplier (Meggitt Aerospace), an original equipment manufacturer (Embraer) and a business aircraft operator (Lider Aviation). His professional experience encompasses the implementation and management of long-duration, high-value aerospace programs in multicultural environments in the United States, Latin America, Europe, and the Middle East. Rene has 35+ years of experience in the aerospace industry with assignments including systems engineering, metallic and composite structural assembling, engine and airframe maintenance, continuous improvement implementation, quality function deployment and program management. Rene earned a Ph. D. in Aerospace Propulsion and an M.S. in Operations Research from ITA - Instituto Tecnologico de Aeronautica, an MBA from Hult International, and a B.Sc. in Aerospace Engineering from UFMG - Universidade Federal de Minas Gerais. He is a motorcycle rider and has a passion for outdoor getaways.

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Engenheiro com mais de 20 anos de experiъncia no setor aeroespacial. Empreendedor que identificou oportunidades de novos negѓcios e fechou contratos com sucesso.
Gerente de Programa, com experiъncia no desenvolvimento de novos produtos e atividades de apoio ao cliente, com foco no entendimento baseado na perspectiva do cliente,
Gestor com experiъncia de trabalho junto ao integrador e montador de aeronaves (OEM), que trabalhou com um fornecedor de componentes de porte internacional (Tier 1) e exerceu funчѕes de lideranчa junto a uma grande companhia aщrea.
Experiъncia profissional junto a empresas da Amщrica Latina, Europa, Oriente Mщdio e EUA.
Lэder de equipe que recrutou, treinou, liderou e desenvolveu equipes multifuncionais, envolvendo o pessoal tecnico, administrativo e comercial.
Formaчуo em Engenharia Mecтnica/Aeronсutica, Mestrado em Pesquisa Operacional e Master in Business Management.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: Interfacing on a daily basis with relevant Embraer personnel to address technical issues at the assembly line and acting as a technical advisor in developing Parker?s products. Participate in commercial, technical and contractual negotiations. Supporting and coordinating development (JDP) and program management activities. Overall responsible for enhancing Parker?s markets share in South America, maintaining and further developing relationship with key customer (Embraer and airlines) decision makers, Identify emerging requirements on existing and future product platforms, detecting and securing participation on potential RFI?s and/or RFQ?s. The combined value of the awards resulting from this approach is estimated to be worth more than US$ 1 billion, over program?s life.
VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-INGLES: Interfacing on a daily basis with relevant Embraer personnel to address technical issues at the assembly line and acting as a technical advisor in developing Parker?s products. Participate in commercial, technical and contractual negotiations. Supporting and coordinating development (JDP) and program management activities. Overall responsible for enhancing Parker?s markets share in South America, maintaining and further developing relationship with key customer (Embraer and airlines) decision makers, Identify emerging requirements on existing and future product platforms, detecting and securing participation on potential RFI?s and/or RFQ?s. The combined value of the awards resulting from this approach is estimated to be worth more than US$ 1 billion, over program?s life.

VINCULOS.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES: As a KCA Director, my main goal is to advance and grow Meggitt's business by making the interface between Meggitt's business and the customer seamless, and by coordinating and facilitating smooth and effective communications and transactions. Developed and maintained a close, trusted and effective working relationship with my designated customer, serving as the main and consistent Meggitt interface to effectively manage the account Responsible for building Meggitt's credibility as a most-valued supplier of solutions, products and services. Developed and maintained business forecast, identified new opportunities and initiated sales. During my period with Meggitt the account with Embraer has expanded continuously, while in parallel two new customers in the region were added with significant impact in business volume.

As account manager I had to identify the customer needs and prepare account objective based on sales strategy. Develop short and mid-term account planning and account objectives. Based on the strategy defined above it was my responsibility to ensure profitable growth of key customers in the airline and MRO segments and ensure high level of customer satisfaction. The main result of the application on this approach was a 30% increase in on sales, driven by the addition of new customers and increased sales with legacy ones.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TEXTO.TITULO-DO-TEXTO: Is Airbreathing Rocketry in your future?
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TEXTO.TITULO-DO-TEXTO-INGLES: Is air breathing rocketry in your future?

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The design, manufacturing, and operation of liquid propellants rockets for the educational purpose have proven elusive for a very long time because it demands enormous amounts of resources within reach of a restricted group of organizations. One possible option to overcome this situation would be the use of a turbo-jet engine as the main propulsion element for an air-breathing class of rockets, in replacement of the complex liquid bi-propellants rocket engine or the traditional solid rocket motors. The strongest motivator behind the turbo-rocket is the development of a new tool to serve as an educational resource for engineering students or a new option for amateur high power rocketry. It also opens possibilities for new studies required to understand better how to overcome the challenges created by this class of propulsion.

DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TEXTO.TITULO-DO-TEXTO: Is Aviation on the Verge of an electric propulsion disruption?
DADOS-BASICOS-DO-TEXTO.TITULO-DO-TEXTO-INGLES: Is aviation on the verge of an electric propulsion disruption?

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aircraft of the future will be simpler to operate and more capable than today?s single-piston-engine aircraft due to a rare convergence of technologies, mainly Electric Propulsion and Information Technology. The transformation is already shaping the automotive industry with most of the legacy car manufacturers and some outsiders as well jumping into the electric car mass production bandwagon, all of them hoping to carve out bigger slices of the market. General aviation may be the first segment of the aeronautical industry to benefit from similar effects. However, the aeronautical industry is lagging behind for some good reasons as there are challenges of all color and shapes yet to overcome before a disruptive generation of small aircraft become a common sight. There is still a significant gap between the promises of designers and the expectations of the early adopters of amazing new technologies. This paper describes some of the challenges and opportunities that arise when the upcoming technology convergence wave finds novel applications in a four/five-seat general aviation aircraft to enter in service by 2025.

PDCA - Uma ferramenta para uso na manutenчуo
A New Approach to Propulsion System Development
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: A New Approach to Propulsion System Development

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics AIAA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Our team has had the chance to work with engineering students, introducing them to the engineering world through the process of using the skills learned at school, to design small size liquid rocket engines based propulsion systems.This is the story of a volunteer based program dedicated to help engineering students to exceed on their profession. It describes how it all started and developed over the years, the challenges faced and the solutions found to keep the organization alive and achieving its objectives.While interacting with those young engineers to be, we learned how motivated they were to apply the recently acquiredknowledge and surprised by the extra efforts they made to accomplish the tasks assigned to them.

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics AIAA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper presents a methodology for sizing swirl injectors that is relevant to liquid rocket engine application, as well as, analyses the results of the experiments executed to investigate the validity of the proposed model. On the first part of this paper, a set of equations used to define the injector dimensions is presented. Most of the equations are well know from the literature, however, they had to be adjusted to incorporate a deviation from the traditional approach, which is the separation of the inlet orifice discharge coefficient calculations from the exit orifice discharge coefficient. On the second part, actual data, collected with the aid of test specimens designed in accordance with the methodology herein described, was compared with values prescribed by the theoretical model. Actual and forecasted values were found to be aligned.

Designing small size liquid rocket engines based propulsion systems was the motivator behind an initiative to introduce engineering students to the engineering world. A process named Challenge Based Training was created, combining the skills students learned at school with a methodology developed by our group. This is the story of a volunteer based program dedicated to help engineering students to exceed on their profession. It describes how it all started and developed over the years, the challenges faced and the solutions found to keep the organization alive and achieving its objectives. While interacting with those young engineers to be, we learned how motivated they were to apply the recently acquired knowledge and surprised by the extra efforts they made to accomplish the tasks assigned to them.

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics AIAA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: This paper describes the results of an experimental investigation in designing, building and testing pintle injectors that are relevant to liquid rocket engine application. A team from UFMG was assigned the challenge to investigate the influence of some constraints on defining a pintle injector architecture that would be relevant in order to meet certain specifications, with focus on controlling the propellant mass flow. On the first part of this paper an overview of the pintle injector main characteristics is introduced, while on the second part, actual results obtained from the prototypes built are presented.
INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper describes the results of an experimental investigation in designing, building and testing pintle injectors that are relevant to liquid rocket engine application. A team from UFMG was assigned the challenge to investigate the influence of some constraints on defining a pintle injector architecture that would be relevant in order to meet certain specifications, with focus on controlling the propellant mass flow. On the first part of this paper an overview of the pintle injector main characteristics is introduced, while on the second part, actual results obtained from the prototypes built are presented.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS: Um injetor do tipo swirl foi construэdo e testado р frio para comparar os dados previstos versus dados de desempenho real. Foi desenvolvido um banco de ensaios para o injetor baseado utilizando um sistema de aquisiчуo de dados da National Instruments integrando a funcionalidade do software LabView. Este banco de ensaios щ composto por um sistema de pressurizaчуo de сgua, sensor de pressуo, sensor de vazуo, placa de aquisiчуo de dados NI 6008 e um programa desenvolvido em Labview, requisitos mэnimos que satifazem as necessidades de ensaio do injetor. Comeчando com um conjunto de parтmetros previamente especificados, incluindo fluxo de massa e тngulo de pulverizaчуo, as principais dimensѕes de um injetor simples do tipo swirl sуo encontrados atravщs de uma abordagem paramщtrica que utilizam alguns modelos bem conhecidos devidamente modificado conforme a nossa experiъncia com esse tipo de injetor. O comportamento do banco de ensaios foi bem satisfatѓrio apesar de algumas limitaчѕes enfrentadas, estas serуo descritas detalhadamente neste artigo, bem como todo desenvolvimento desse sistema de ensaios do injetor.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: A Methodology for Thrust Chamber Design
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: A Methodology for Thrust Chamber Design

DETALHAMENTO-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALHO.INSTITUICAO-PROMOTORA: American Institute of Aeronautics and Astronautics AIAA

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper describes the elements of a parametric model designed to be used in the preliminary design of certain aspects of a liquid propellant thrust chamber. Starting with a set of parameters defined by the final user, this model delivers engine performance, combustion chamber and nozzle main dimensions with accuracy level acceptable for the conceptual design phase. Good correlation was found between actual engine dimensions and results obtained with the application of the parametric model herein described.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: General Aviation 2025 - A study in electric propulsion
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: General Aviation 2025 - A study in electric propulsion

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: The aircraft of the future will be simpler to operate and more capable than today?s single-piston-engine aircraft due to a rare convergence of technologies, mainly Electric Propulsion and Information Technology. The transformation is already shaping the automotive industry with most of the legacy car manufacturers and some outsiders as well jumping into the electric car mass production bandwagon, all of them hoping to carve out bigger slices of the market. General aviation may be the first segment of the aeronautical industry to benefit from similar effects. However, the aeronautical industry is lagging behind for some good reasons as there are challenges of all color and shapes yet to overcome before a disruptive generation of small aircraft become a common sight. There is still a significant gap between the promises of designers and the expectations of the early adopters of amazing new technologies. This paper describes some of the challenges and opportunities that arise when the upcoming technology convergence wave finds novel applications in a four/five-seat general aviation aircraft to enter in service by 2025.

The design, manufacturing, and operation of liquid propellants rockets for the educational purpose have proven elusive for a very long time because it demands enormous amounts of resources within reach of a restricted group of organizations. One possible option to overcome this situation would be the use of a turbo-jet engine as the main propulsion element for an air-breathing class of rockets, in replacement of the complex liquid bi-propellants rocket engine or the traditional solid rocket motors. The strongest motivator behind the turbo-rocket is the development of a new tool to serve as an educational resource for engineering students or a new option for amateur high power rocketry. It also opens possibilities for new studies required to understand better how to overcome the challenges created by this class of flying machine.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Electric Propulsion and other opportunities for General Aviation
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: Electric Propulsion and other Opportunities to Reinvigorate General Aviation.

AREA-DO-CONHECIMENTO-1.NOME-DA-ESPECIALIDADE: Combustуo e Escoamento com Reaчѕes Quэmicas

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: Interurban air mobility refers to air transportation activities designed for small groups of 2-6 passengers traveling relatively short distances between locations 200-300 miles apart. This paper defends the argument that the major transformational process required to revamp the piston-engine aircraft industry will be made possible by a set of emergent, exponential technologies coalescing in the field of aviation over the next five years. The personal aircraft coming into service by 2025 will be simpler to operate and more capable than today?s piston-engine aircraft because of a rare convergence of apparently unrelated technologies, mainly electric propulsion, automation, and autonomy.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This paper defends the argument that the process required to revamp the piston-engine aircraft industry will be made possible by a set of emergent, exponential technologies coalescing in the field of aviation over the next five years. The personal aircraft coming into service by 2025 will be simpler to operate and more capable than today?s piston-engine aircraft because of a rare convergence of apparently unrelated technologies, mainly electric propulsion, automation, and autonomy.

DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO: Production of Electricity using dish concentrators: a review
DADOS-BASICOS-DA-APRESENTACAO-DE-TRABALH.TITULO-INGLES: ELECTRICITY PRODUCTION USING DISH/STIRLING CONCENTRATORS: A REVIEW

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This work presents a review of the literature on the study of electricity generation using dish/Stirling Concentrator. Firstly, a brief description of the main components of this solar system is given, which include the Stirling engine and some of its parameters. Following, the CSP (Concentrated Solar Power) is analyzed, and its most common technology is presented. The SPD (Solar Parabolic Dish) power plants are presented, revealing the advantages of the dish/Stirling system among all solar technologies. The dish/Stirling system has proven to be an attractive alternative to produce electricity, especially due to its high efficiency, up to 30%, and its unique design that allows wide flexibility in the choice of fuel.

INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS.DESCRICAO-INFORMACOES-ADICIONAIS-INGLES: This presentation will provide an overview of how to increase general aviation market size by transforming existing small aircraft into a new product that is safer, simpler to operate, and more comfortable. This can be accomplished by implementing three key technologies: Electrification, Automation and Autonomy. The future aircraft may no longer be controlled by humans, mechanically operated by ?cable-and-pulley?, or powered by an internal combustion engine.
